mapper.insert: insert into keypair_standby_1024( pub_key, pri_key, kpg_algorithm, km_kpg_task, gen_time )values( #{pubKey}, #{priKey}, #{keyPairAlgorithm.algorithmName}, #{KpgTask.name}, #{genTime} )
insert into keypair_standby_2048( pub_key, pri_key, kpg_algorithm, km_kpg_task, gen_time )values( #{pubKey}, #{priKey}, #{keyPairAlgorithm.algorithmName}, #{KpgTask.name}, #{genTime} )
